content: कॄत् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (कीर्तयति-ते, कीर्तित) {@--1@} To mention, repeat, utter: नाम्नि कीर्तित एव <ls>R. 1. 87.</ls> <ls>Ms. 7. 167</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">2. 124.</ls> {@--2@} To tell, recite, declare, communicate; <ls>Ms. 3. 36</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 42.</ls> {@--3@} To name, call. {@--4@} To praise, glorify, commemorate; अपप्रथत्गुणान् भ्रातुरचिकीर्तच्च विक्रमं <ls>Bk. 15. 72.</ls>
